TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Counter<T> : System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Instrument<T> where T : struct
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Counter`1<struct .ctor (class System.ValueType) T> extends System.Diagnostics.Metrics.Instrument`1<!T>
Public NotInheritable Class Counter(Of T) Inherits Instrument(Of T)
type Counter<'T (requires 'T : struct)> = class inherit Instrument<'T (requires 'T : struct)>
generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic ref class Counter sealed : System::Diagnostics::Metrics::Instrument<T>

Docs.typeparam: The type that the counter represents.
Docs.summary: Represents an instrument that supports adding non-negative values. For example, you might call counter.Add(1) each time a request is processed to track the total number of requests. Most metric viewers display counters using a rate (requests/sec), by default, but can also display a cumulative total.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This class supports only the following generic parameter types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, and <xref:System.Decimal>
